alert.note: Alert for Collier (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 3:43PM EDT until September 13 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Collier County in southwestern Florida... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 342 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carnestown, or near Everglades City, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Everglades City and Carnestown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
